title: Dad ‘proud’ of Bieber’s manhood
text:
Jeremy Bieber tweets pride at son Justin Bieber’s penis size after nude pics Network Writers News Corp Australia Network Jeremy Bieber tweets pride at son Justin Bieber’s penis size after nude pics Network Writers News Corp Australia Network Exposed ... We can’t show you the nude photos, but we can show you this one from two weeks ago. Picture: Instagram 
JUSTIN Bieber’s dad, Jeremy, has weirded out Twitter users after posting his pride and his son’s junk following nude photos which surfaced this week. 
Naked photos of Bieber Jr surfaced from his trip to Bora Bora with Jayde Pierce and went viral on the internet. Fatherly pride ... Jeremy Bieber and his son, Justin. Picture: Supplied 
The image prompted countless memes about the impressive size of Bieber’s manhood. 
His dad, weirdly, decided to weigh in on it as well, tweeting to his son “@justinbieber what do you feed that thing. #proud daddy”. @justinbieber what do you feed that thing. #proud daddy ☺️ — Jeremy Bieber (@JeremyBieber) October 9, 2015 
He added an emoji of a blushing face. 
However he left many Twitter users not only blushing but feeling creeped out. Other Stories
